name: Ch.10ABaseConvo2
_source: speak;Colm;Alright, now that the Princess is here, we can settle this.
speak;Eirika;So, what's so important that I have to be here?|We've got important things to do, you know!
speak;Joshua;This won't take long, don't worry.|I just want to prove to him that I'm faster.
speak;Colm;No way!|I'm totally faster than you!|Right, Princess?
speak;Colm;Well, we'll need to race, then!|That's why you're here!|Joshua and I will race, and we want you to be the judge!
speak;Joshua;Yep, even though we already know I'll win.|You ready, Colm?
speak;Colm;I'm ready to beat you and prove I'm the fastest!
speak;Eirika;Oh, all right...|On your marks....|Get set...|And.....Go!
speak;Colm;Nah, I totally won that one! Right?!
speak;Joshua;No, it was clearly me! Right?!
speak;Colm;Ha!|I told you I'm the fastest, Joshua!
speak;Joshua;Bah, you just caught me at a bad time.|I'll show you that I'm the fastest another day!
speak;Colm;Ha ha!|I'll take on your challenge, anytime, anywhere!
alert;Colm's SPD growth has increased by 15!
speak;Joshua;I told you I was the fastest, little man.
speak;Colm;Grrrr...|Just you wait, Joshua!|I'll be faster than you soon!
speak;Joshua;Ha!|I'd like to see you try!
alert;Joshua's SPD growth has increased by 15!
